page.title: 07EDUCATION:BADINGHM/DENNINGTN
page.content: Prior to Sept 1980 Badingham children were in Peasenhall catchment area. From Sept 1980 Badingham children were transferred to Dennington VCP school's catchment area & at secondary age to Thomas Mills High School Framlingham. Badingham children already attending Peasenhall CP, Saxmundham Middle & Leiston High Schools have continued there until the end of their school career.Owls Green, Dennington falls within the Laxfield catchment area. {Attendance at schools:}PRIMARY: Dennington 18 Framlingham 4 Laxfield 3 MIDDLE: Saxmundham 6 HIGH: Leiston 5 Thomas Mills 15 Stradbroke 5 PRIVATE: Brandeston 1 Framlingham College 3 Rickmansworth Masonic 3. Attendance at Playgroups 5 Youth Training Scheme 1 Higher Education 6 Adult Classes 10 Open University 1.
